pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multidimensional Adaptive Testing // Simulates Multidimensional Adaptive Testing using the multidimensional three-parameter logistic model as described in Segall (1996) doi:10.1007/BF02294343, van der Linden (1999) doi:10.3102/10769986024004398, Reckase (2009) doi:10.1007/978-0-387-89976-3, and Mulder van der Linden (2009) doi:10.1007/s11336-008-9097-5.
